info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:09PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 200 PM MST... At 107 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Ajo, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazards to motorists due to blowing dust causing reduced visibility and strong winds causing difficult handling conditions. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Maricopa County. This includes AZ Route 85 south of Gila Bend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
